name: Box Jump Pro
description:
Challenging and mind bending puzzle platformer!
*...and due to some mystical bugs can also be classified as a rage game... Neat*
Find a right order to break boxes and reach the flag.
Pass 40 stages and beat 4 time trials.

How to play

A / Left arrow =  turn left/jump left.

D / Right arrow =  turn right/jump right.

Yep. It's that simple.
